about.title: About Me üë®‚Äçüíª
paragraphs: Hello! I'm Yoquelvis Jorge Abreu, a passionate web developer with a love for creating beautiful and functional websites. üöÄ
I specialize in front-end development, with expertise in React, JavaScript, HTML5, and modern CSS frameworks like Tailwind CSS. üíª
Additionally, I have experience with Node.js, allowing me to work on full-stack projects. üåê
My skill set also includes Git for version control, SQL for database management, and Linux for server environments. üõ†Ô∏è
I am familiar with Python and Machine Learning, which expands my capabilities in data analysis and AI-driven projects. ü§ñ
Moreover, I have experience in Power BI for data visualization, and I'm knowledgeable in Microservices architecture for scalable applications. üìäüîß
When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or enjoying a good cup of coffee. ‚òï

jobs.title: Web Development
jobs.description: I work on the creation and optimization of websites, using technologies such as HTML, CSS and JavaScript, among other frameworks, focusing on user experience and the performance of web applications.

jobs.title: Intern, Technology/Management Systems
jobs.description: During my internship in Technology/Management Systems, I used Oracle SQL to manage enterprise data and created reports and analysis using tools such as Pentaho and BI Publisher, supporting decision making.
